server

Interface ConnectionListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServerApplication

    public interface ConnectionListener
    This interface defines callbacks called when specific actions from the connection occur.
    Author:
    Nicholas M. Mizoguchi

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCheckForUpdateRequest(ConnectionController controller)
      Callback method called when the ConnectionController requests for updates from the server.
      void onClientDisconnected(ConnectionController controller)
      Callback method called when the client that the ConnectionController was handling disconnects.
      void onMessageReceived(ConnectionController callerController, java.lang.String message)
      Callback method called when the ConnectionController receives a message from the client.

    • Method Detail

      • onMessageReceived

        void onMessageReceived(ConnectionController callerController,
                     java.lang.String message)
        Callback method called when the ConnectionController receives a message from the client.
        Parameters:
        callerController - the connectionController that called this method.
        message - the message received.

      • onCheckForUpdateRequest

        void onCheckForUpdateRequest(ConnectionController controller)
        Callback method called when the ConnectionController requests for updates from the server. This method should already send updates to the client through the callerController.
        Parameters:
        controller - the connectionController that called this method.

      • onClientDisconnected

        void onClientDisconnected(ConnectionController controller)
        Callback method called when the client that the ConnectionController was handling disconnects.
        Parameters:
        controller - the connectionController that called this method.
